tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_data (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    block_id INT,
    transaction_hash VARCHAR(255),
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_hash STRING,
    sender_address STRING,
    receiver_address STRING,
    amount DECIMAL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE block_headers (
    block_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    previous_block_hash STRING,
    block_hash STRING,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    num_transactions INT
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    block_id UUID,
    transaction_hash STRING,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    amount DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
  transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_verification (
  verification_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  transaction_id UUID NOT NULL,
  verified_by VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  verification_result BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_metadata (
  metadata_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  chain_id UUID NOT NULL,
  total_blocks INT NOT NULL,
  total_transactions INT NOT NULL,
  last_updated TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE transaction_block ( block_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, transaction_id UUID NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL, from_account VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, to_account VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE block_chain ( chain_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, block_height INT NOT NULL, previous_block_id INT NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL )

CREATE TABLE transaction ( transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, block_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL, from_account VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, to_account VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE account ( account_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, account_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, balance DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE miner_reward ( reward_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, block_id INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(18, 2) NOT NULL, miner_id INT NOT NULL, timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL )
